Text:
Woah, ver 1.0 only 159MB, 1.2 blew out to 228MB now 1.3 is 358MB. Where will it stop!

AprilSwift: Need to be jailbroken, and use Cydia to install AppSync..

right if ur phone is jb you need to go into cydia after u restore open cydia go to manage click on sources then click edit then click add then when the window comes up type cydia.hackulo.us then add just accept everything then when it does the restore have ur iphone plugged in with itunes open double click ur ipa file then it will install into ur phone and itunes
